English: number (quantity, amount, mathematical or grammatical concept)
Sense: quantity | abstract entity used to describe quantity | mathematics: number | grammar: state of being singular, dual or plural
Constraints: Skip:numera (Not ideal since it doesn't distinguish quantity from position); Skip:numer (Not ideal since it doesn't distinguish quantity from position)

English: number (position in sequence or identifier, e.g. of a house or phone)
Sense: used to show the rank of something in a list or sequence
